testcase.name: As a user, I want to search flights from Delhi, so that I can book flights
testcase.system-out: Given I have a request URL "https://voyager.goibibo.com/api/v2/flights_search/find_node_by_name_v2".passed When I send request "https://voyager.goibibo.com/api/v2/flights_search/find_node_by_name_v2" with endpiont "/?search_query=DEL&limit=15&v=2".passed Then I see response code 200................................................passed And I get the response......................................................passed And I verify the value at "data.r.n[0]" is "Delhi Airport"..................passed And I verify the value at "data.r.iata[0]" is "DEL".........................passed

testcase.name: As a user, I want to do a sample post call
testcase.system-out: Given I have a request URL "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users".....passed When I send POST request "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users".......passed Then I see response code 201................................................passed And I get the response......................................................passed And I verify the value at "0.name" is "Krishna Rungta"......................passed And I verify the value at "0.address.city" is "Gwenborough".................passed
